'''Northlander Catalyst Billet''' is a [[Forging Material]] used in [[forging]] 4-Star [[catalysts]] of the [[Infusion Series]], [[Prototype Series]], [[Dragonspine Series]] and [[Amethyst Series]].

==Alchemy==
{{Recipe
|type = Converting
|Midlander Catalyst Billet = 1
|Dream Solvent = 2
|sort = Midlander Catalyst Billet;Dream Solvent
}}
{{Recipe
|type = Converting
|Borderland Catalyst Billet = 1
|Dream Solvent = 2
|sort = Borderland Catalyst Billet;Dream Solvent
}}
